results.title: Effects of lisinopril, a new angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor in a cryo-injury model of chronic left ventricular failure.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ completely restored the cardiac output to normal values at the end of this six week period.

citations.NLM: Lefer DJ, Hock CE, Ribeiro LG, Lefer AM. Effects of lisinopril, a new angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor in a cryo-injury model of chronic left ventricular failure. Methods Find Exp Clin Pharmacol. 1986 Jun;8(6):357-62. PMID: 3016431
